issue.title: [Python] Add NOTICE.txt and LICENSE.txt files to pyarrow-{version}.tar.gz to pypi.org Download files
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11953](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11953). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Please include NOTICE.txt and LICENSE.txt files from wheel files also to pyarrow-\{version}.tar.gz files listed under pyarrow project on pypi.org ([https://pypi.org/project/pyarrow/#description](https://pypi.org/project/pyarrow/)). Thank you.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11953?focusedCommentId=17302526) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Indeed, the sdist currently does not contain license information. But, our MANIFEST.in explicitly mentions to include those files, so not fully sure why that doesn't work. Maybe that doesn't work with files outside of the source tree? (the license files are one directory up compared to setup.py)
